alert.note: Alert for Chase; Greenwood (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 14 at 5:27PM CDT until April 14 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Chase County in east central Kansas... Northwestern Greenwood County in southeastern Kansas... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 526 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles northeast of Burns to 18 miles southeast of Florence to 15 miles northeast of El Dorado, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Cottonwood Falls, Strong City, Bazaar, Saffordville and Tallgrass Prairie Preserve. This includes Interstate 35 between Mile Markers 103 and 116. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
